meanings.definition: A type of nerve cell body.
meanings.sent1: The cytons in the brain help transmit signals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study cytons to understand how the nervous system functions.
meanings.sent3: The cytons threw a party, but only the dendrites showed up.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts raced through her mind like a network of cytons.
meanings.sent5: The cytons are like the command center of the nerve cell.
